actions.description: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Shortsword

actions.description: 4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Longbow

specialTraits.description: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
specialTraits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight

specialTraits.description: The scout has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry

specialTraits.description: The scout can breathe air and water.
specialTraits.name: Child of the Sea
